data.name: Frontline Tactics - Close Quater Combat Soldier
data.detailed_description:
CQC? The Close Quarter Combat soldier - a fighting unit trained to engage the enemy with personal weapons at close range with a rapid assault and a precise application of lethal force.

Key Features:

  • A soldier unit slot with an unlocked Close Quarter Combat proficiency
  • A first weapon equip
  • 100,000 in-game credits to upgrade and/or equip soldier
data.about_the_game:
CQC? The Close Quarter Combat soldier - a fighting unit trained to engage the enemy with personal weapons at close range with a rapid assault and a precise application of lethal force.

data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB of RAM
  • Hard Drive: 300 MB HD space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB of RAM
  • Hard Drive: 300 MB HD space
